Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 38 points and hit a season-high seven 3-pointers.
Max Christie had a career-high 28 points.
Austin Reaves contributed 15 points, 11 assists, and eight rebounds.
Anfernee Simons scored 11 of his 23 points in the fourth quarter.
James and Christie combined for 11 points down the stretch, capped by James' seventh 3-pointer with 59 seconds left.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James' 3-point shooting over the past four games was 14 of 24.
Anthony Davis sat out to rest his sprained left ankle.
Gabe Vincent also sat with a hip injury.
Jaxson Hayes returned from a 15-game injury absence.
Dorian Finney-Smith and Shake Milton played their second game for the Lakers since arriving in a trade with Brooklyn.
